General.Name: Dynaresource Inc
General.Description: DynaResource, Inc. engages in the investment, exploration, and management of precious and base metal properties. The company primarily explores for gold, silver, and other metals. Its flagship property comprises the San Jose de Gracia property comprising 33 concessions covering approximately 9,920 hectares located in the northern Sinaloa State, Mexico. The company was formerly known as West Coast Mines, Inc. and changed its name to DynaResource, Inc. in November 1998. DynaResource, Inc. was incorporated in 1937 and is headquartered in Irving, Texas.
General.Address: North Tower, Irving, TX, United States, 75039
